Network states.quote: So essentially a network state is a state with enough power (violence) to subjugate any existing legacy nation state.
Network states.author: Nick

Network states.quote: I wrote a few thoughts about Network States emerging from Network Unions, mostly sparked from considering the Free State Project in New Hampshire.
Network states.author: Christopher

Network states.quote: The term ‘network state’ somehow implies that we are competing head-on with legacy nation-states, which may not necessarily be the case.
Network states.author: Jim
